successes.title: B I B L I O T H E C A
successes.description: The Biblical Literature elegantly designed & crafted for enjoyable reading, separated into volumes, and free of all numbers, notes, &c.

Pledges.description: Help the cause! Every bit helps! You'll receive project updates and a sincere "Thank You" email.
